I'm with God! RT @H_FJ Victory, and in only 33 minutes! This is proof positive that God wants there to be H&FJ webfonts this year.
I keep having dreams where I have an iPad. Not a joke.
Maybe I should buy 100 rolls of Tri-X film, a developing cannister, chemicals, and a negative scanner and live some idealic life.
Heading over to the Boy's & Girl's club for a coffee house.
The Wackness- entering my top 4 movies AS WE SPEAK.
Watching The Wackness.
@bluemonq in a showing of awe-inspiring kindness gifted me a year of Flickr Pro. I am so so grateful. Been stressing lately about that...
I just downloaded Beirut's discography. Asked my friend for some suggestions, now I'm playing 4 Beirut covers at a coffee house tonight.
$25 for Flickr Pro is just not money I have right now.
For now I'm going to go to sleep. But tomorrow I'm buying a sampler. And chopping up samples. Really.
@safetyguy1656 Logotype mockups: http://is.gd/pDL
Going to sleep. I feel like there's something I'm forgetting. Fuck it though.
Everything in my left pocket: http://is.gd/pgX
I'd love to spend $50 on this ring: http://is.gd/pfm
